anya-e0201n5:2: Atha dhātupaccayasaṁsiddhaṁ kāla, kāraka, purisa, saṅkhyābhedadīpakaṁ liṅgabhedarahitaṁ kriyāpadhānavācakaṁ tyādyantanāmakaṁ ākhyātapadaṁ dīpiyate.
anya-e0201n5:3: Tattha kriyaṁ dhāretīti dhātu. Sā pakatidhātu, vikatidhātu, nāmadhātuvasena tividhā.
anya-e0201n5:4: Tattha bhū, hū, gamu, paca iccādi pakatidhātu nāma sabhāvena siddhattā.
anya-e0201n5:5: Titikkha, tikiccha, bubhukkha, jighacchaiccādi vikatidhātu nāma saṅkhatavasena siddhattā.
anya-e0201n5:6: Puttīya, pabbatāya iccādi nāmadhātu nāma nāmabhūtassa sato kriyavācīpaccayayogena dhātuṭṭhāne ṭhitattā.
anya-e0201n5:8: Tatthayā dhātu kammāpekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadati, sā sakammikā nāma. Gāmaṁ gacchati, odanaṁ pacati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:9: Yā kammanirapekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadati, sā akammikā nāma. Bhavati, hoti, tiṭṭhati, seti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:11: Tattha yā ekakammāpekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadati, sā ekakammikā nāma. Gāmaṁ gacchati, odanaṁ pacati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:12: Yā padhānā’padhānavasena kammadvayāpekkhaṁ kriyaṁ vadati, sā dvikammikā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:14: Tattha yā dhātu pāpanatthā hoti, sā nyādi nāma. Ajaṁ gāmaṁ neti, bhāraṁ gāmaṁ vahati, sākhaṁ gāmaṁ ākaḍḍhati.
anya-e0201n5:15_0: Sesā dvikammikā duhādi nāma. Gāviṁ khīraṁ duhati, brāhmaṇaṁ kambalaṁ yācati, dāyakaṁ
anya-e0201n5:15_1: bhikkhaṁ bhikkhati, goṇaṁ vajaṁ rundhati, bhagavantaṁ pañhaṁ pucchati, sissaṁ dhammaṁ
anya-e0201n5:15_2: anusāsati, bhagavā bhikkhū etaṁ [vacanaṁ] avoca, rājā amaccaṁ vacanaṁ bravīti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:16_0: Tattha yadā kammasmiṁ rūpaṁ sijjhati, tadā vibhatti, paccayā nyādimhi padhānakammaṁ
anya-e0201n5:16_1: vadanti, duhādimhi apadhānakammaṁ, sabbadhātūsu kāritayoge kāritakammanti, sabbañcetaṁ
anya-e0201n5:16_2: dhātūnaṁ pakatiatthavasena vuttaṁ, anekatthattā pana dhātūnaṁ atthantaravacane vā
anya-e0201n5:16_3: nānupasaggayoge vā akammikāpi sakammikā honti, sakammikāpi akammikā honti.
anya-e0201n5:21: Vida – anubhavane, sukhaṁ vedeti, vipākaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti ma. ni. 3.303.
anya-e0201n5:22: Vida – ārocane, vedayāmahaṁ bhante vedayatīti maṁ dhāretu cūḷava. aṭṭha. 102, kāraṇaṁ nivedeti, dhammaṁ paṭivedeti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:24_0: Pada-gatiyaṁ, maggaṁ pajjati, paṭipajjati, maggo uppajjati, nipajjati, sampajjati,
anya-e0201n5:24_1: bhogo bhavati, sambhavati, bhogaṁ anubhavati, taṇhaṁ abhibhavati, paribhavati, adhibhavati,
anya-e0201n5:24_2: araññaṁ abhisambhavati, ajjhogāhatīti attho. Gacchantaṁ magge abhisambhavati, sampāpuṇātīti attho iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:25: Padānaṁ byañjanasampattiyā vā atthasampattiyā vā upakārakā vibhatti, paccayā paccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:26: Tattha vibhattiyo tyādi, tvādiiccādinā aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti, sarūpato channavutividhā.
anya-e0201n5:27: Tattha pubbachakkabhūtāni aṭṭhacattālīsarūpāni parassapadāni nāma. Parachakkabhūtāni aṭṭhacattālīsarūpāni attanopadāni nāma.
anya-e0201n5:28: Tattha parahitapaṭisaṁyuttesu ṭhānesu pavattibahulāni padāni parassapadāni nāma. Attahitapaṭisaṁyuttesu pavattibahulāni attanopadāni nāmāti eke.
anya-e0201n5:29_0: Paro vuccati kattā sabbakriyāsādhāraṇattā, attā vuccati kammaṁ sakasakakriyāsādhāraṇattā,
anya-e0201n5:29_1: parassa abhidhāyakāni padāni parassapadāni, attano abhidhāyakāni padāni attanopadānīti aññe.
anya-e0201n5:30: Attā vuccati padatthānaṁ sarīrabhūtā kriyā, kattunā pana sādhyaṭṭhena kriyarūpāni bhāva, kammānipi attāti vuccanti. Sādhakaṭṭhena tehi parabhūto kattā paro nāmāti apare.
anya-e0201n5:31_0: Attā vuccati amhattho, paro vuccati tumha, nāmattho, pubbachakkāni parabahulattā
anya-e0201n5:31_1: parassapadāni nāma, parachakkāni pana rūḷhīvasena attanopadāni nāmātipi vadanti.
anya-e0201n5:31_2: Idaṁ na yujjati parachakkesu tabbahulamattassāpi asiddhattā. Pāḷibhāsaṁ pana patvā
anya-e0201n5:31_3: dvinnaṁ chakkānaṁ attahita, parahitesu vā tīsu kārakesu vā pavattinānāttaṁ na dissatiyeva,
anya-e0201n5:31_4: tasmā imasmiṁ ganthe taṁ nāmadvayaṁ na gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:32: Paccayā pana catubbidhā vikaraṇa, kicca, kārita, dhātupaccayavasena.
anya-e0201n5:33: Tattha ye dhātusiddhāni tyādipadāni tabbādipadāni ca gaṇavibhāgavasena aññamaññaṁ visadisarūpāni karonti, te vikaraṇapaccayā nāma, la, ya, ṇoiccādayo.
anya-e0201n5:35: Paresaṁ āṇāpanasaṅkhāte payojakabyāpāre pavattā ṇi, ṇāpipaccayā kāritapaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:36: Visuṁ taṁtaṁkriyavācībhāvena dhāturūpā kha, cha, saiccādikā paccayā dhātupaccayā nāma.
anya-e0201n5:37: “Kāla, kāraka, purisa, saṅkhyābhedadīpaka”nti ettha atīta, paccuppannā’nāgata, kālavimuttavasena kālabhedo catubbidho.
anya-e0201n5:38: Tattha hiyyattanī, ajjattanī ajjatanī (bahūsu), parokkhāti imā tisso vibhattiyo atīte kāle vattanti.
anya-e0201n5:41: Sattamī, kālātipattīti dve kālavimutte vattanti, ayaṁ kira porāṇiko vibhattīnaṁ kamo, so ca pāḷiyā sametiyeva.
anya-e0201n5:43: Athopi viharissanti, esā buddhāna dhammatā”ti a. ni. 4.21 ca –
anya-e0201n5:44_0: “Abbhatītā ca ye buddhā, vattamānā anāgatā”ti ca apa. thera 1.1.588 pāḷī. Imasmiṁ
anya-e0201n5:44_1: kame pañcamī, sattamīti nāmadvayampi anvatthavasena siddhaṁ bhavati. Pacchā pana
anya-e0201n5:45_0: Kattu, kamma, bhāvā pana kārakabhedo nāma. Tattha bhāvo duvidho sādhya, sādhanavasena
anya-e0201n5:45_1: visesana, visesyavasena ca. Tattha dhātvatthakriyā sādhyabhāvo nāma. Paccayatthakriyā sādhanabhāvo nāma.
anya-e0201n5:46_0: Tesu sādhyabhāvo nānādhātūnaṁ vasena nānāvidho hoti. Sādhanabhāvo nānādhātvatthānaṁ
anya-e0201n5:46_1: pavattākārasaṅkhātena ekaṭṭhena ekova hoti. So pana yathā jāti nāma anuppannapakkhe
anya-e0201n5:46_2: ṭhite saṅkhatadhamme uppādentī viya khāyati, tathā vohāravisayamatte ṭhite sabbadhātvatthe
anya-e0201n5:46_3: pātubhonte karonto viya khāyati, tasmā so sādhananti ca kārakanti ca vuccati. Yathā
anya-e0201n5:46_4: ca jātivasena uppannā saṅkhatadhammā “cintanaṁ jātaṁ, phusanaṁ jāta” miccādinā ekantameva
anya-e0201n5:46_5: jātiṁ visesenti, tathā paccayatthavasena pātubhontā nānādhātvatthāpi “bhuyyate, gamyate,
anya-e0201n5:46_6: paccate, bhavanaṁ, gamanaṁ, pacana” miccādinā ekantameva paccayatthaṁ visesenti.
anya-e0201n5:46_7: Vatticchāvasena pana bhāvasādhanapadesu dhātvattha, paccayatthānaṁ abhedopi vattuṁ
anya-e0201n5:46_8: yujjatiyeva. Idha pana dvīsu bhāvesu sādhanabhāvo adhippetoti.
anya-e0201n5:47_1: paṭisaṁvedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā”ti ma. ni. 3.1 ettha attā eva
anya-e0201n5:47_2: vuccati, so ca attā “so karoti, so paṭisaṁvedetī”ti a. ni. 6.43; visuddhi. 2.580
anya-e0201n5:47_3: ettha kārakoti vuccati. Iti ‘puriso’ti kārako eva.
anya-e0201n5:48_0: So ca tividho nāmattho, tumhattho, amhattho cāti. Tattha attano ajjhattasantānabhūtattā
anya-e0201n5:48_1: amhattho uttamapuriso nāma, sesā pana kamena paṭhamapuriso, majjhimapurisoti vuccanti.
anya-e0201n5:48_2: Vibhattiyo pana taddīpakattā paṭhamapurisādināmaṁ labhanti. Idañca nāmaṁ kārakabhede
anya-e0201n5:48_3: antogadhamevāti katvā imasmiṁ ganthe na gahitanti.
anya-e0201n5:50: ‘Liṅgabhedarahita’nti “puriso gacchati, itthī gacchati, kulaṁ gacchati” iccādīsu ‘puriso’iccādīnaṁ abhidheyyapadānaṁ liṅgānugato rūpabhedo ākhyātapade natthi.
anya-e0201n5:51: ‘Kriyāpadhānavācaka’nti ettha kriyaṁ eva padhānato abhidhāti, na nāmapadaṁ viya dabbaṁ padhānato abhidhātīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0201n5:52: Tattha kriyā nāma dhātvatthabhāvo vuccati, sā ca kālavasena atītakriyā, paccuppannakriyā, anāgatakriyā, kālavimuttakriyāti catubbidhā hoti.
anya-e0201n5:53: Āṇattikriyā, āsiṭṭhakriyā, anumatikriyā, parikappakriyā, araha, sakka, vidhi, nimantanā’mantanādikriyāti bahuvidho kriyābhedoti.
anya-e0201n5:54: Bhū-sattāyaṁ, santassa bhāvo sattā, tassaṁ sattāyaṁ, bhūdhātu sattāyamatthe vattate, sabbapadatthānaṁ sadda, buddhivisayabhāvena vijjamānabhāve vattatetyattho.
anya-e0201n5:56_0: Adhikārasuttamidaṁ, kriyatthā paraṁ vibhatti, paccayā bhavantīti attho. Kriyā attho
anya-e0201n5:56_1: yassāti kriyattho. Pakatidhātu, vikatidhātu, nāmadhātuvasena tividho dhātu, kāritapaccayantarūpampi
anya-e0201n5:57: 562.Vattamānetianti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mheka. 414; rū. 428; nī. 872; caṁ. 1.2.82; pā. 3.2.123.
anya-e0201n5:58_0: Ārabhitvā niṭṭhaṁ anupagato bhāvo vattamāno nāma, taṁsambandhīkālopi tadūpacārena
anya-e0201n5:58_1: vattamānoti vuccati. Vattamāne kāle kriyatthā paraṁ tyādivibhattiyo bhavanti. Ayañca
anya-e0201n5:58_2: vibhatti tyādīti ca vattamānakālavisayattā vattamānāti ca sijjhati.
anya-e0201n5:59: 563.Pubbāparachakkānamekānekesu tumhamhasesesu dve dve majjhimuttamapaṭhamāka. 408; rū. 431; nī. 867.
anya-e0201n5:60_0: Tumhanāmaṁ, amhanāmaṁ, tadubhayato sesanāmanti tīsu nāmesu payujjamānesu vā gamyamānesu
anya-e0201n5:60_1: vā ekasmiṁ vā anekesu vā atthesu pubbachakka, parachakkānaṁ dve dve majjhima, uttama,
anya-e0201n5:60_2: paṭhamā vibhattiyo bhavanti. “Uttamanti uttaraṁ antima”nti cūḷamoggallāne vuttaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:61: Ettha ca vibhattividhānamukhena taṁtaṁsaññāvidhānampi siddhaṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n5:62: Kathaṁ?Ti, anti, si, tha, mi, ma iti pubbachakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0201n5:63: Te, ante, se, vhe, e, mhe iti parachakkaṁ nāma.
anya-e0201n5:64: Pubbachakke ca-ti, antidvayaṁ paṭhamadukaṁ nāma, si, thadvayaṁ majjhimadukaṁ nāma, mi, madvayaṁ uttamadukaṁ nāma. Evaṁ parachakke.
anya-e0201n5:65_0: Tattha tulyādhikaraṇabhūte sesanāme payujjamāne vā gamyamāne vā paṭhamadukaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0201n5:65_1: Tathā tumhanāme majjhimadukaṁ, amhanāme uttamadukaṁ. Dukesu ca ekasmiṁ atthe vattabbe
anya-e0201n5:66_0: Ettha ca nāmānaṁ atthanissitā katvattha, kammatthā idha nāmatthāti vuccanti. Kattu,
anya-e0201n5:66_1: kammasaṅkhāte yasmiṁ nāmatthe tyādivibhattiyo bhavanti, so nāmattho tyādivācakānaṁ
anya-e0201n5:66_2: eva vāccabhūto vuttattho nāma hoti, na syādivibhattīnaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:67: Vuttakattu, kammādhiṭṭhānassa ca liṅgatthassa vācakaṁ nāmapadaṁ abhidheyyapadaṁ nāma, etadeva tulyādhikaraṇapadanti ca vuccati.
anya-e0201n5:68_0: Amādayo ca atthavācakavibhattiyo etasmiṁ okāsaṁ na labhanti, liṅgatthamattajotikā
anya-e0201n5:68_1: paṭhamāvibhatti eva okāsaṁ labhati. Evarūpāni tulyādhikaraṇabhūtāni abhidheyyapadāni
anya-e0201n5:69: Idañca suttaṁ suddhehi tumha’mha, sesanāmehi yuttavākye ca missakehi yuttavākye cāti dvīsu dvīsu vākyesu veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:70: Tattha suddhehi yutte paccekaṁ dukāni vattanti. Yathā? So gacchati, te gacchanti, tvaṁ gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha, ahaṁ gacchāmi, mayaṁ gacchāmāti.
anya-e0201n5:71_0: Tathā suddhadvandepi. Yathā? So ca so ca gacchati, gacchanti vā. Te ca te ca gacchanti,
anya-e0201n5:71_1: so ca te ca gacchanti, tvañca tvañca gacchasi, gacchatha vā. Tumhe ca tumhe ca gacchatha,
anya-e0201n5:72_0: Missakehi yutte dvandavākye pana ‘vippaṭisedhe’ti saṅketattā paradukāni eva okāsaṁ
anya-e0201n5:72_1: labhanti, tesu ca bahuvacanāni eva. Yathā? So ca tvañca gacchatha, so ca ahañca gacchāma,
anya-e0201n5:72_2: tvañca ahañca gacchāma, so ca tvañca ahañca gacchāma. Ekavacanacatukkaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:73: Te ca tumhe ca gacchatha, te ca mayañca gacchāma, tumhe ca mayañca gacchāma, te ca tumhe ca mayañca gacchāma. Bahuvacanacatukkaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:74: So ca tumhe ca gacchatha, so ca mayañca gacchāma, tvañca mayañca gacchāma, so ca tvañca mayañca gacchāma. Ekavacanamūlacatukkaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:75: Te ca tvañca gacchatha, te ca ahañca gacchāma, tumhe ca ahañca gacchāma, te ca tumhe ca ahañca gacchāma. Bahuvacanamūlacatukkaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:76_0: Api ca tvañca so ca gacchatha, ahañca so ca gacchāma, tvañca ahañca so ca gacchāma,
anya-e0201n5:76_1: tumhe ca so ca gacchatha, mayañca so ca gacchāma, tvañca te ca gacchatha, ahañca
anya-e0201n5:77: Atrimā pāḷī – tuvañca putto suṇisā ca nattā, sammodamānā gharamāvasetha jā. 1.8.7. Ahañca putto suṇisā ca nattā, sammodamānā gharamāvasema jā. 1.8.7.
anya-e0201n5:78: Ahañca dāni āyasmā ca sāriputto bhikkhusaṅghaṁ pariharissāma ma. ni. 2.160.
anya-e0201n5:79: Ahañca ime ca bhikkhū samādhinā nisīdimhā.
anya-e0201n5:80: Ahañca bhariyā ca dānapatī ahumhā jā. 2.22.1593.
anya-e0201n5:81: Ahañca sāmiko ca dānapatī ahumhā jā. 2.22.1617 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:82_0: Yaṁ pana “so ca gacchati, tvañca gacchasī”ti vattabbe “tumhe gacchathā”ti vā “so
anya-e0201n5:82_1: ca gacchati, ahañca gacchāmī”ti vattabbe “mayaṁ gacchāmā”ti vā vacanaṁ, taṁ pakatibahuvacanameva,
anya-e0201n5:83_0: Yañca kaccāyane – “sabbesamekābhidhāne paro puriso”ti nī. 216 piṭṭhe suttaṁ, tatthapi
anya-e0201n5:83_1: sabbesaṁ dvinnaṁ vā tiṇṇaṁ vā missakabhūtānaṁ nāma, tumha’mhānaṁ ekato abhidhāne
anya-e0201n5:83_2: missakadvandavākye paro puriso yojetabboti attho na na sambhavatīti.
anya-e0201n5:85: Aparokkhesu māna, nta, tyādīsu paresu kriyatthā paraṁ kattari lānubandho apaccayo hoti. Lānubandho ‘ūlasse’ti sutte visesanattho.
anya-e0201n5:86: Etena yattha māna, nta, tyādayo kattari vattanti, tattha ayaṁ lapaccayoti lapaccayena tesaṁ kattuvācakabhāvaṁ ñāpeti, esa nayo “kyo bhāvakammesu…” iccādīsupi.
anya-e0201n5:87_0: Ettha ca vikaraṇapaccayā nāma byañjanapūraṇā eva honti, na atthapūraṇā, tasmā yasmiṁ
anya-e0201n5:87_1: payoge tehi vinā padarūpaṁ na sijjhati, tattheva te vattanti. Yattha sijjhati, tattha
anya-e0201n5:87_2: na vattanti, ayampi lapaccayo dhātuto paraṁ vibhattisare vā āgamasare vā asante vattati,
anya-e0201n5:87_3: sante pana “pacāmi, pacāma, pacāhi, gameti, gamenti, vajjeti, vajjenti”-iccādīsu
anya-e0201n5:87_4: kāriyantaratthāya vattati. Yattha ca paccayānaṁ lopo vihito, tattha gaṇantara, rūpantarappasaṅgapaṭisiddhāya
anya-e0201n5:89_0: Vibhatti, paccayā paccayo nāma. I, kī, khi, ci, ji iccādayo ivaṇṇā nāma. Cu, ju,
anya-e0201n5:89_1: bhū, hū iccādayo uvaṇṇā nāma. Paccaye pare ekakkharadhātvantānaṁ ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇānaṁ
anya-e0201n5:89_2: kamena e, ovuddhiyo honti. ‘Paro kvacī’ti parasaralopo.
anya-e0201n5:90: Saṁpubbo-sambhoti, sambhonti, sambhosi, sambhotha, sambhomi, sambhoma.
anya-e0201n5:91: Anupubbo-anubhavane, so bhogaṁ anubhoti, te bhogaṁ anubhonti, tvaṁ bhogaṁ anubhosi, tumhe bhogaṁ anubhotha, ahaṁ bhogaṁ anubhomi, mayaṁ bhogaṁ anubhoma.
anya-e0201n5:92: Tattha yathā “nīlo paṭo”ti ettha nīlasaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n5:95: Nīlasaddo pana vaccātthameva ujuṁ vadati, nīlasaddamattaṁ suṇanto nīlaguṇameva ujuṁ jānāti, tasmā “paṭo” iti padantarena nīlasaddassa abhidheyyattho ācikkhīyati.
anya-e0201n5:96: Tathā “anubhotī”ti ettha tisaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n5:99_0: Tisaddo pana vāccatthameva ujuṁ vadati, na abhidheyyatthaṁ. “Anubhotī”ti suṇantosādhyakriyāsahitaṁ
anya-e0201n5:99_1: kattārameva ujuṁ jānāti, na kiñci dabbanti attho. Tasmā “so” iti padantarena tisaddassa
anya-e0201n5:99_2: abhidheyyattho ācikkhīyati, vāccatthassa pana tisaddeneva ujuṁ vuttattā tatiyāvibhattiyā
anya-e0201n5:99_3: puna ācikkhitabbakiccaṁ natthi, liṅgatthajotanatthaṁ abhidheyyapade paṭhamāvibhatti
anya-e0201n5:101: Sare pare e, onaṁ kamena aya, avā honti. Ya, vesu a-kāro uccāraṇattho.
anya-e0201n5:104: Hi, mi, mesu paresu a-kārassa dīgho hoti.
anya-e0201n5:106: Parachakke – bhavate, bhavante, bhavase, bhavavhe, bhave, bhavamhe.
anya-e0201n5:108: Adhyā’bhi, paripubbo hiṁsāyaṁ, adhibhavati, abhibhavati, paribhavati.
anya-e0201n5:109: Vipubbo vināse, pākaṭe, sobhaṇe ca, vibhavati.
anya-e0201n5:111: Abhi, saṁpubbo pattiyaṁ, ajjhogāhe ca, abhisambhavati, tathā pātubbhavati, āvibhavati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:114: 568.Kyobhāvakammesvaparokkhesu māna nta tyādīsuka. 440; rū. 445; nī. 920; caṁ. 1.1.80; pā. 3.1.67.
anya-e0201n5:115: Parokkhāvajjitesu māna, ntapaccayesu tyādīsu ca paresu kriyatthā bhāvasmiṁ kammani ca kānubandho yapaccayo hoti, bahulādhikārā kvaci kattari ca.
anya-e0201n5:116: Rūpaṁ vibhuyyati, so pahīyissati saṁ. ni. 1.249, bhattaṁ paccati, gimhe udakaṁ chijjati, kusūlo bhijjati.
anya-e0201n5:118: Kānubandhe nāgame ca ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇānaṁ assa ca te e, o,-ā na hontīti kyamhi vuddhi natthi.
anya-e0201n5:119_0: Kamme-tena purisena bhogo anubhūyati, tena bhogā anubhūyanti, tena tvaṁ anubhūyasi,
anya-e0201n5:119_1: tena tumhe anubhūyatha, tena ahaṁ anubhūyāmi, tena mayaṁ anubhūyāma. Yassa dvittaṁ
anya-e0201n5:120: Tattha “anubhūyatī”ti ettha kyapaccayasahitassa tisaddassa attho duvidho vāccattho, abhidheyyatthoti.
anya-e0201n5:123_0: Tisaddo pana kyapaccayasahito vāccatthameva ujuṁ vadati, na abhidheyyatthaṁ. “Anubhūyatī”ti
anya-e0201n5:123_1: suṇanto sādhyakriyāsahitaṁ kammasattiṁ eva ujuṁ jānāti, na kiñci dabbanti vuttaṁ
anya-e0201n5:124: Anubhūyate, anubhuyyate, anubhūyante, anubhuyyante, anubhūyase, anubhūyavhe, anubhūye, anubhuyye, anubhūyamhe, anubhuyyamhe.
anya-e0201n5:126: Garupubbamhā rassato nte, ntīnaṁ reādeso hoti.
anya-e0201n5:127: Jāyare, jāyanti, jāyare, jāyante, gacchare, gacchanti, gacchare, gacchante, gamissare, gamissanti, gamissare, gamissante.
anya-e0201n5:130: Ettha ca suttavibhāgena “sabbaṁ hidaṁ bhañjare kālapariyāyaṁ jā. 1.15.370, muñcare bandhanasmā jā. 2.22.1648, jīvare’ vāpi sussatī”ti jā. 2.22.840 etāni pāḷipadāni sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n5:131: Tattha ‘bhañjare’ti bhijjati, ‘muñcare’ti muñcantu, ‘jīvare’ vāpī’ti jīvanto’vāpi. Anubhūyare, anubhūyanti, anubhūyare, anubhūyante.
anya-e0201n5:132_0: Bhāvo nāma bhavana, gamanādiko kriyākāro, so dhātunā eva tulyādhikaraṇabhāvena visesīyati,
anya-e0201n5:132_1: na nāmapadena, tasmā tattha tumha’mha, sesanāmavasena tyādidukavisesayogo nāma natthi,
anya-e0201n5:132_2: paṭhamadukameva tattha bhavati, dabbasseva ca tassa abyattasarūpattā saṅkhyābhedopi
anya-e0201n5:133: Tena bhogaṁ anubhūyati, anubhuyyati, anubhūyate, anubhuyyate, anubhavanaṁ hotīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:137: Yo suddhakattāraṁ payojeti, tassa payojakassa kattuno byāpāre kriyatthā ṇi ca ṇāpi ca honti. Ṇānubandhā vuddhutthā.
anya-e0201n5:138: Tesu ca ākārantato ‘ato’ (moga.) ṇāpiyeva hoti, dāpeti, dāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:140: Sesato dvepi, pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti, pācāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:141: Payojakabyāpāropi kriyā evāti tadatthavācīhi ṇi,-ṇāpīhi paraṁ vibhatti, paccayā bhavanti, dhātvantassa ca ṇi, ṇāpīnañca vuddhi.
anya-e0201n5:142: So maggaṁ bhāveti, te maggaṁ bhāventi, tvaṁ maggaṁ bhāvesi, tumhe maggaṁ bhāvetha, ahaṁ maggaṁ bhāvemi, mayaṁ maggaṁ bhāvema.
anya-e0201n5:144: E, onaṁ kamena āya, āvā honti sarādo ṇānubandhe paccaye pare, suttavibhattiyā aṇānubandhepi āyā’vā honti.
anya-e0201n5:147: Jhe-cintāyaṁ, jhāyati, jhāyanti, ujjhāyati, nijjhāyati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:149: Ṇi, ṇāpi, āpīhi ca kattari lo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:151: Iminā asare ṭhāne ayādesato paraṁ akāro hoti, so maggaṁ bhāvayati, bhāvayanti, bhāvayasi, bhāvayatha, bhāvayāmi, bhāvayāma.
anya-e0201n5:156: Kriyatthā parassa kyassa ādimhi īña hoti.
anya-e0201n5:157: Tena maggo bhāvīyati, tena maggā bhāvīyanti, tena tvaṁ bhāvīyasi, tena tumhe bhāvīyatha, tena ahaṁ bhāvīyāmi, tena mayaṁ bhāvīyāma.
anya-e0201n5:163: Ekakammā dvikammā ca, dvikammā ca tikammakā.
anya-e0201n5:164: Iti suddhakatturūpaṁ, suddhakammarūpaṁ, hetukatturūpaṁ, hetukammarūpanti ekadhātumhi cattāri nipphannarūpāni labbhanti.
anya-e0201n5:165: Katturūpena cettha kammakatturūpampi saṅgayhati. Kusūlo bhijjati, bhijjanadhammo bhijjati.
anya-e0201n5:166: Kammarūpena ca kattukammarūpampi saṅgayhati. Tattha yaṁ padaṁ kattuvācakaṁ samānaṁ saddarūpena kammarūpaṁ bhavati, taṁ kattukammarūpaṁ nāma, taṁ pāḷiyaṁ bahulaṁ dissati.
anya-e0201n5:167_0: Rūpaṁ vibhāviyyati mahāni. 108, atikkamiyyati, samatikkamiyyati, vītivattiyyati,
anya-e0201n5:167_1: nimittaṁ abhibhuyyatīti gotrabhu paṭi. ma. 1.59, pavattaṁ abhibhuyyati paṭi. ma.
anya-e0201n5:167_2: 1.59, cutiṁ abhibhuyyati, upapattiṁ abhibhuyyatīti paṭi. ma. 1.59 gotrabhu iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:168_0: Tathā so pahīyethāpi nopi pahīyetha saṁ. ni. 1.249, so pahīyissati saṁ. ni. 1.249,
anya-e0201n5:168_1: nihiyyati yaso tassa dī. ni. 3.246, hiyyoti hiyyati poso, pareti parihāyati jā. 1.15.348,
anya-e0201n5:168_2: ājānīyā hasīyanti jā. 2.22.2369, vidhurassa hadayaṁ dhaniyati jā. 2.22.1350 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:169_0: Yañca ‘yamhi dā dhā mā thā hā pā maha mathādīnamī’ti kaccāyane suttaṁ, taṁ kammani
anya-e0201n5:169_1: icchanti, kattari eva yujjati kammani ivaṇṇāgamassa sabbhāvā. Saddanītiyaṁ pana “so
anya-e0201n5:169_2: pahīyissatī”ti padānaṁ bhāvarūpattaṁ daḷhaṁ vadati, tāni pana kattukammarūpāni evāti.
anya-e0201n5:170: Ettha ca vattamānaṁ catubbidhaṁ niccapavattaṁ, pavattāvirataṁ, pavattuparataṁ, samīpavattamānanti.
anya-e0201n5:171: Tattha niccapavatte – idhāyaṁ pabbato tiṭṭhati, candimasūriyā pariyāyanti, disā bhanti virocamānā a. ni. 4.69.
anya-e0201n5:172: Pavattāvirate – api nu te gahapati kule dānaṁ dīyatīti, dīyati me bhante kule dānaṁ a. ni. 9.20.
anya-e0201n5:173: Ettha ca yāva dāne saussāho, tāva yathāpavattā dānakriyā vattamānā eva nāma hoti ussāhassa aviratattā.
anya-e0201n5:174_0: Pavattuparate – na khādati ayaṁ maṁsaṁ, neva pāṇaṁ hanati a. ni. 3.67, na adinnaṁ
anya-e0201n5:174_1: ādiyati a. ni. 3.67. Ettha yāva tabbipakkhakriyaṁ na karoti, tāva viramaṇakriyā vattamānā eva nāma hoti.
anya-e0201n5:175: Samīpe – atīte – kuto nu tvaṁ āgacchasi saṁ. ni. 1.130, rājagahato āgacchāmīti. Anāgate – dhammaṁ te desemi, sādhukaṁ suṇohi.
anya-e0201n5:176: Suttavibhattena tadāyoge atītepi ayaṁ vibhatti hoti, vākacīrāni dhunanto, gacchāmi ambare tadā bu. vaṁ. 2.37.
anya-e0201n5:177_0: Yāva, pure, purāyoge anāgatepi-idheva tāva tiṭṭhāhi, yāvāhaṁ āgacchāmi, yaṁnūnāhaṁ
anya-e0201n5:177_1: dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṁ pārā. aṭṭha. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā, pure adhammo
anya-e0201n5:177_2: dibbati, dhammo paṭibāhiyyati cūḷava. 437, dante ime chinda purā marāmi jā. 1.16.127.
anya-e0201n5:178: Ekaṁsatthepi-nirayaṁ nūnagacchāmi, ettha me natthi saṁsayo jā. 2.22.331. Avassambhāviyatthepi-dhuvaṁ buddho bhavāmahaṁ bu. vaṁ. 2.109, dhuvaṁ buddho bhavissati bu. vaṁ. 2.81 vā.
anya-e0201n5:179: Aniyamatthepi-manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā dha. pa. 2 cintetīti cittaṁ dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1, phusatīti phasso dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1, bujjhatīti buddho.
anya-e0201n5:180: Kadā karahiyogepi-kadā gacchati, karahi gacchati, gamissati vā.
anya-e0201n5:184: 575.Tu antu hi tha mi ma taṁ antaṁ su vho e āmaseka. 424; rū. 450; nī. 897; caṁ. 1.3.122; pā. 3.3.162.
anya-e0201n5:185: Vattamāne kāle pañha, patthanā, vidhīsu kriyatthā tvādayo honti.
anya-e0201n5:186: Pañhe-dhammaṁ vā tvaṁ adhiyassu vinayaṁ vā pāci. 471 (atthato sadisaṁ).
anya-e0201n5:188: Tattha patthanāyaṁ-bhavābhave saṁsaranto, saddho homi amaccharī.
anya-e0201n5:189: Āsīsāyaṁ-etena saccavajjena, pajjunno abhivassatu cariyā. 3.89, sabbe bhadrāni passantu jā. 1.2.105, sabbe sattā averā hontu paṭi. ma. 2.22.
anya-e0201n5:191_0: Āyācane-desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṁ dī. ni. 2.68, ovadatu maṁ bhagavā saṁ. ni.
anya-e0201n5:191_1: 3.1, anusāsatu maṁ sugata saṁ. ni. 3.1, ullumpatu maṁ bhante saṅgho mahāva. 71, asmākaṁ
anya-e0201n5:191_2: adhipannānaṁ, khamassu rājakuñjara jā. 2.21.181, etha byagghā nivattavho jā. 1.3.66.
anya-e0201n5:193: Tattha vidhimhi-akusalaṁ pajahatha, kusalaṁ upasampajja viharatha paṭi. ma. 3.30; pārā. 19, evaṁ vitakketha, mā evaṁ vitakketha paṭi. ma. 3.30.
anya-e0201n5:194: Niyojane-etha bhikkhave sīlavā hotha a. ni. 5.114, appamādena sampādetha dī. ni. 2.185, etha gaṇhatha bandhatha dī. ni. 2.342, mā vo muñcittha kiñcanaṁ dī. ni. 2.342.
anya-e0201n5:198: Pavāraṇāyaṁ-vadatu maṁ bhante saṅgho mahāva. aṭṭha. 213, vadetha bhante yenattho pārā. 290.
anya-e0201n5:199: Anumatiyaṁ-paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṁ vā karohi pāci. 374.
anya-e0201n5:200: Varadāne-phussatī varavaṇṇābhe, varassu dasadhā vare jā. 2.22.1655, icchitaṁ patthitaṁ tuyhaṁ, khippameva samijjhatu a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.192.
anya-e0201n5:201: Anuññāyaṁ-puccha vāsava maṁ pañhaṁ, yaṁ kiñci manasicchasi dī. ni. 2.356.
anya-e0201n5:204: Akkose-muddhā te phalatu sattadhā jā. 1.16.295, corā taṁ khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṁ chindantu ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.
anya-e0201n5:205: Sapathe-etena saccavajjena, putto uppajjataṁ ise jā. 1.14.104, musā me bhaṇamānāya, muddhā phalatu sattadhā jā. 1.14.104.
anya-e0201n5:206: Āmantane-etu vessantaro rājā jā. 2.22.2341, “ehi bhikkhu cara brahmacariyaṁ mahāva. 28, etha bhikkhave sīlavā hotha” iccādīsupi ehi, ethasaddā āmantane tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0201n5:207: Nimantane-adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā svātanāya bhattaṁ pārā. 77.
anya-e0201n5:208: Pavedane-vedayatīti maṁ saṅgho dhāretu cūḷava. aṭṭha. 102, upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu dī. ni. 1.299, punārāyu ca me laddho, evaṁ jānāhi mārisa dī. ni. 2.369.
anya-e0201n5:209_0: Pattakāle-parinibbātu bhante bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato, parinibbānakālo bhante
anya-e0201n5:209_1: bhagavato dī. ni. 2.168, kālo kho te mahāvīra, uppajja mātukucchiyaṁ bu. vaṁ. 1.67,
anya-e0201n5:209_2: byākarohi aggivessana na dāni te tuṇhībhāvassa kālo ma. ni. 1.357.
anya-e0201n5:210: Anubhotu, anubhontu, anubhohi, anubhotha, anubhomi, anubhoma, bhavatu, bhavantu, ‘himimesvassā’ti hi, mi, mesu assa dīgho, tvaṁ paṇḍito bhavāhi.
anya-e0201n5:214: Iminā ato hissa lopo, tvaṁ paṇḍito bhava.
anya-e0201n5:216: Parachakke-so bhavataṁ, te bhavantaṁ, tvaṁ bhavassu, tumhe bhavavho, ahaṁ bhave, mayaṁ bhavāmase, imāni suddhakatturūpāni.
anya-e0201n5:217: Anubhūyatu, anubhūyantu, anubhuyyatu, anubhuyyantu iccādi suddhakammarūpaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:218: Bhāvetu, bhāventu, bhāvayatu, bhāvayantu iccādi hetukatturūpaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:219: Bhāvīyatu, bhāvīyantu. Rassatte-bhāviyatu, bhāviyantu. Dvitte-bhāviyyatu, bhāviyyantu. Tathā bhāvayīyatu, bhāvayīyantuiccādi hetukammarūpaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:220: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādisuttena thassa vho, tumhe bhavavho, bhavatha vā.
anya-e0201n5:224: 577.Hetuphalesveyya eyyuṁ eyyāsi eyyātha eyyāmi eyyāma etha eraṁ etho eyyāvhoeyyavho (moggallānādīsu)eyyaṁ eyyāmhe vāka. 416; rū. 454; nī. 880; caṁ. 1.3.120; pā. 3.3.156.
anya-e0201n5:225_0: Aññamaññasambandhiniyā hetukriyāyañca phalakriyāyañca kriyatthā eyyādayo honti vā.
anya-e0201n5:225_1: Hetuphalesupi kadāci aññavibhattuppattidīpanattho vāsaddo, sace so yānaṁ labhissati,
anya-e0201n5:225_2: gamissati, sace na labhissati, na gamissati iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:226: Sace saṅkhāro nicco bhaveyya, sukho nāma bhaveyya, sace so paṇḍito bhaveyya, sukhito bhaveyya.
anya-e0201n5:229: Pañhe-kinnu kho tvaṁ vinayaṁ vā adhiyyeyyāsi dhammaṁ vā.
anya-e0201n5:231: Vidhimhi-pāṇaṁ na haneyya, adinnaṁ na ādiyeyya, dānaṁ dadeyya, sīlaṁ rakkheyya.
anya-e0201n5:234: Bhavaṁ rajjaṁ kareyya, bhavaṁ rajjaṁ kātuṁ sakko, kātuṁ arahoti attho.
anya-e0201n5:235: So imaṁ vijaṭaye jaṭaṁ saṁ. ni. 1.23.
anya-e0201n5:238: Pabbatamapi sirasā bhindeyya, bhaveyya, bhaveyyuṁ, bhaveyyāsi, bhaveyyātha, bhaveyyāmi, bhaveyyāma.
anya-e0201n5:239: Parachakke-so bhavetha, te bhaveraṁ, tvaṁ bhavetho, tumhe bhaveyyāvho, ahaṁ bhaveyyaṁ, mayaṁ bhaveyyāmhe, iti suddhakatturūpāni.
anya-e0201n5:240: Anubhūyeyya, anubhūyeyyuṁ. Dvitte rassattaṁ, anubhuyyeyya, anubhuyyeyyuṁ iccādi suddhakammarūpaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:241: Bhāveyya, bhāveyyuṁ, bhāvayeyya, bhāvayeyyuṁ iccādi hetukatturūpaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:242: Bhāvīyeyya, bhāvīyeyyuṁ. Rassatte-bhāvayiyeyya, bhāvayiyeyyuṁ. Dvitte-bhāviyyeyya, bhāviyyeyyuṁ. Tathā bhāvayīyeyya, bhāvayīyeyyuṁ iccādi hetukammarūpaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:244: Eyya, eyyāsi, eyyamiccetesaṁ ṭe hoti vā.
anya-e0201n5:245_0: Atrimā pāḷī-caje mattā sukhaṁ dhīro, passe ce vipulaṁ sukhaṁ dha. pa. 290. Kiṁ tvaṁ
anya-e0201n5:245_1: sutasomā’nutappe jā. 2.21.399, dhīraṁ passe suṇe dhīraṁ, dhīrena saha saṁvase jā. 1.13.94 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:246: So bhave, bhaveyya, tvaṁ bhave, bhaveyyāsi, ahaṁ bhave, bhaveyyaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:249: Atrimā pāḷī-vajjuṁ vā te na vā vajjuṁ, natthi nāsāya rūhanā jā. 1.3.33, upayānāni me dajjuṁ, rājaputta tayī gateti jā. 2.22.26.
anya-e0201n5:251: Eyyāmassa emu ca hoti, antassa u ca.
anya-e0201n5:252_0: Atrimā pāḷī-kathaṁ jānemu taṁ mayaṁ dī. ni. 2.318, muñcemu naṁ uragaṁ bandhanasmā
anya-e0201n5:252_1: jā. 1.15.252, dakkhemu te nāga nivesanāni jā. 1.15.254, gantvāna taṁ paṭikaremu accayaṁ,
anya-e0201n5:252_2: appeva naṁ putta labhemu jīvitaṁ jā. 1.15.13, dajjemu kho pañcasatāni bhoto jā. 2.22.1302,
anya-e0201n5:252_3: pañhaṁ pucchemu mārisa dī. ni. 2.354, viharemu averino dī. ni. 2.357, tayājja guttā
anya-e0201n5:253_0: Mahāvuttinā kvaci majjhe yyā-kārassa lopo, atthaṁ dhammañca pucchesi jā. 1.16.150,
anya-e0201n5:253_1: uregaṇḍāyo bujjhesi, tāyo bujjhesi māṇava jā. 2.17.132-133, yathā gatiṁ me abhisambhavetha
anya-e0201n5:253_2: jā. 2.17.87-89, yathā gatiṁ te abhisambhavema jā. 2.17.87-89, okāsaṁ sampajānātha,
anya-e0201n5:254: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādisuttena eyyāthassa o ca, tumhe bhaveyyātho, bhaveyyātha vā.
anya-e0201n5:255: Ettha ca pubbe vuttā pañha, patthanā, vidhippabhedā idhapi yathāpayogaṁ veditabbā. Pañhasaddena paripañha, paripucchā, parivitakka, parivīmaṁsādayo saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n5:256: Paripañhe-dhammaṁ vā paṭhamaṁ saṅgāyeyyāma vinayaṁ vā.
anya-e0201n5:257: Paripucchāyaṁ-vadetha bhante kimahaṁ kareyyaṁ, ko imassa attho, kathañcassa atthaṁ ahaṁ jāneyyaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:258: Parivitakke-kassāhaṁ paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ dī. ni. 2.72, yaṁnūnāhaṁ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyaṁ pārā. aṭṭha. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathā.
anya-e0201n5:259: Parivīmaṁsāyaṁ-gaccheyyaṁ vā ahaṁ uposathaṁ, na vāgaccheyyaṁ mahāva. 137.
anya-e0201n5:260: Patthanāyaṁ-evaṁrūpo siyaṁ ahaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ ma. ni. 3.274, ummādantyā ramitvāna, sivirājā tato siyaṁ jā. 2.18.70, passeyya taṁ vassasataṁ arogaṁ jā. 2.21.453.
anya-e0201n5:261: Āyācane-labheyyāhaṁ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ, labheyyaṁ upasampadaṁ mahāva. 28; saṁ. ni. 2.17.

anya-e0201n5:598: Mahāvuttinā mhāssa uñca. “Pañcasatā mayaṁ sabbā, tāvatiṁsupagā ahu”nti pāḷi.
anya-e0201n5:599: Parachakke assa aṁ, ahaṁ pubbe ahuvaṁ, ahuva vā.
anya-e0201n5:601_0: Atrimā pāḷī- “ahaṁ kevaṭṭagāmasmiṁ, ahuṁ kevaṭṭadārako apa. thera 1.39.86, cakkavattī
anya-e0201n5:601_1: ahuṁ rājā, jambumaṇḍassa issaro. Sattakkhattuṁ mahābrahmā, vasavattī tadā ahuṁ. Muddhābhisitto
anya-e0201n5:604: Ssatyādimhi hūdhātussa he ca hohi ca hohi ca honti.
anya-e0201n5:605: Hessati, hessanti, hehissati, hehissanti, hohissati, hohissanti. Buddho hessaṁ sadevake bu. vaṁ. 2.55, anāgatamhi addhāne, hessāma sammukhā imaṁ bu. vaṁ. 2.74.
anya-e0201n5:606: 626.Dakkha sakkha hehi hohīhi lopoka. 480; rū. 490; nī. 961; ‘dakkhā hehihohilopo’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n5:607: Etehi ādesehi ssassa lopo hoti vā. Suttavibhattena aññehipi ssalopo.
anya-e0201n5:608: Sakkhisi tvaṁ kuṇḍalini, maññisi khattabandhuni jā. 2.17.14. Na hi sakkhinti chettuṁ su. ni. 28, adhammo haññiti dhammamajja jā. 1.11.31, brahmadatto palāyiti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:610_0: Atrimā pāḷī-piyo ca me hehiti mālabhārī, ahañca naṁ mālinī ajjhupessaṁ jā. 1.15.197,
anya-e0201n5:610_1: tilodano hehiti sādhupakko jā. 1.8.2. Doso pemañca hehiti theragā. 719. Mama tvaṁ
anya-e0201n5:610_2: hehisi bhariyā jā. 1.14.27. Tato sukhī hohisi vītarāgo. Khippaṁ hohisi anāsavo dī. ni. 2.207 iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:613_0: E-āgatiyaṁ gatiyañca, ke-sadde, khe-khādanu’paṭṭhānesu, ge-sadde, apapubba ce-pūjāyaṁ,
anya-e0201n5:613_1: jhe-cintāyaṁ dāha’jjhānesu ca, te-pālane, the-sadda, saṅghātesu, de-suddhi, niddāsu,
anya-e0201n5:613_2: pe-vuddhiyaṁ, bhe-bhaye, le-chedane, ve-gatiyaṁ tantasantāne ca, se-antakriyāyaṁ,
anya-e0201n5:614_0: Ṇānubandhapaccayena vinā yesaṁ dhātūnaṁ āyādeso labbhati, te edantā nāma. Mahāvuttinā
anya-e0201n5:614_1: yalope sati ādantehi samānarūpaṁ, ādantānañca yāgame sati edantehi samānarūpaṁ, tasmā
anya-e0201n5:615_0: Mahāvuttinā edantānaṁ tyādīsu tabbādīsu ca āyādeso, kvaci yalopo, e-āgatiyaṁ. Ayaṁ
anya-e0201n5:615_1: so sārathī eti jā. 2.22.51, sace enti manussattaṁ saṁ. ni. 1.49, lakkhaṇaṁ passa
anya-e0201n5:615_2: āyantaṁ, migasaṅghapurakkhataṁ jā. 1.1.11, yoga’māyanti maccuno saṁ. ni. 1.20, āyāmāvuso
anya-e0201n5:615_3: pārā. 228, āyāmānanda dī. ni. 2.186; pārā. 22; ma. ni. 1.273.
anya-e0201n5:616: Ettha edhātu āgaccha, gacchāmāti atthadvayaṁ vadati, yādhātuvasena āgaccha, yāmātipi atthaṁ vadanti.
anya-e0201n5:618_0: Kucchitā dhammā āyanti vaḍḍhanti etthāti kāyo, ‘āyo’ti vuccati vaḍḍhi, tato apeto
anya-e0201n5:618_1: apāyo, tena upeto upāyo, avayavadhammā samudenti etthāti samudāyo, paribyattaṁ āyanti etenāti pariyāyo.
anya-e0201n5:621: Khe-khādane, tiṇaṁ khāyati, vikkhāyati, undurā khāyanti, vikkhāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:622: Khe-upaṭṭhāne, khāyati, pakkhāyati, alakkhī viya khāyati.
anya-e0201n5:624: Apapubba ce-pūjāyaṁ, apacāyati, ye vuddha’mapacāyanti jā. 1.1.37.
anya-e0201n5:625: Jhe-cintāyaṁ, jhāyati, jhāyanti, pajjhāyati, pajjhāyanti, abhijjhāyati, abhijjhāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:626: Jhe-olokane, nijjhāyati, nijjhāyanti, upanijjhāyati, upanijjhāyanti, ujjhāyati, ujjhāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:629: Ṇāpimhi yalopo, kaṭṭhaṁ jhāpeti, jhāpenti, jhāpayati, jhāpayanti.
anya-e0201n5:630: Jhe-ajjhayane saṁpubbo, mahāvuttinā niggahītassa jādeso, sajjhāyati, sajjhāyanti, mantaṁ sajjhāyati.
anya-e0201n5:636_0: Bhe-bhaye, bhāyati, bhāyanti, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno dha. pa. 129, bhāyasi, sace
anya-e0201n5:636_1: bhāyatha dukkhassa udā. 44, kinnu kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi ma. ni. 1.381,
anya-e0201n5:636_2: nataṁ bhāyāmi āvuso, bhāyāma apa. therī. 2.2.458.
anya-e0201n5:638: Īādimhi-mā bhāyi, mā soci dī. ni. 2.207, mā cintayi.
anya-e0201n5:640: Le-chedane, tiṇaṁ lāyati, sāliṁ lāyati, lāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:649: Ṇi, ṇāpīnaṁ lopo hoti tesuṇi, ṇāpīsu paresu.
anya-e0201n5:650: Bhikkhu attanā vippakataṁ kuṭiṁ parehi pariyosāpeti pārā. 363. Ettha akammakattā dhātussa ‘kuṭi’nti ca ‘parehī’ti ca dve kammāni dvikkhattuṁ pavattehi kāritehi sijjhanti.
anya-e0201n5:652: Hare-lajjāyaṁ, harāyati, harāyanti, aṭṭiyāmi harāyāmi saṁ. ni. 1.165, harāyāma, harāyatīti hirī, mahāvuttinā upantassa ittaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:653: Gile-rujjane, gilāyati, piṭṭhi me āgilāyati cūḷava. 345; dī. ni. 3.300, gilāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:656: “Jhānaṁ, ujjhānaṁ, nijjhānaṁ, tāṇaṁ, parittāṇaṁ, vodānaṁ, niddānaṁ, gilāno, palāto, milātanti”ādīsu yalopo.
anya-e0201n5:662: Atha byañjanantadhāturūpāni vuccante. Tāni ca avuddhika, savuddhikavasena duvidhāni honti. Tattha avuddhikāni tāva vuccante.
anya-e0201n5:663: Khipa, guha, tuda, disa, pisa, phusa, likha, vadhādi.
anya-e0201n5:664: Idha dhātūnaṁ antassaro uccāraṇattho, so rūpavidhāne nappayujjate.
anya-e0201n5:666: Tudādīhi kānubandho apaccayo hoti. Kānubandho avuddhidīpanattho.
anya-e0201n5:667: Khipa-khipane, khipati, pakkhipati, ukkhipati, okkhipati, nikkhipati, vikkhipati, paṭikkhipati, saṁkhipati.
anya-e0201n5:669: Kārite-khipeti, khipayati, khipāpeti, khipāpayati, khepeti, khepayati vā, udakaṁ khepeti, taṇhaṁ khepeti, khayāpetīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:672: Kārite gussa dīgho, gūheti, gūhayati, gūhāpeti, gūhāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:680: ‘Tavaggavaraṇānaṁ ye cavaggabayañā’ti dassa jattaṁ. ‘Vaggalasehi te’ti yassa pubbarūpattaṁ, tujjati.
anya-e0201n5:682: Disī-uddisane, uddisanaṁ sarūpato kathanaṁ. Uddisati, pātimokkhaṁ uddisanti mahāva. 152, niddisati, niddisanti, apadisati, apadisanti.
anya-e0201n5:684: Kārite-ācariyo sissaṁ pāḷidhammaṁ uddisāpeti, uddisāpayati, vācetīti attho. Pāṭhesu pana sadvayampi dissati.
anya-e0201n5:685: Nuda-khipane, nudati, panudati, vinodeti, paṭivinodeti vā.
anya-e0201n5:691: Phusa-samphasse pattiyañca, phusati, phusanti dhīrā nibbānaṁ dha. pa. 23, vajjaṁ naṁ phuseyya pārā. 409; cūḷava. 344.
anya-e0201n5:698: Yamhi dhassa jhattaṁ, yassa pubbarūpaṁ. ‘Catutthadutiyesvesaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā’ti jhassa tatiyajattaṁ, vajjhati, vajjhanti, vajjhare. Ime sattā haññantu vā vajjhantu vā ma. ni. 1.60.
anya-e0201n5:699: Kārite-vadheti, vadhayati, vadhāpeti, vadhāpayati, sāmiko purisaṁ maggaṁ gameti, gamayati, gamāpeti, gamāpayati iccādīnipi idha vattabbāni.
anya-e0201n5:703_0: Asa-bhuvi, āsa-nivāse upavesane ca, isu-icchā, kantīsu, kamu-padagamane, kusa-akkose,
anya-e0201n5:703_1: gamu-gatimhi, jaravayohānimhi, jana-janane, mara-pāṇacāge, yamu-uparame, ruda-assuvimocane
anya-e0201n5:703_2: kandane ca, ruha-janane, labha-lābhe, vaca, vada-viyattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ, vida-ñāṇe, vasa-nivāse,
anya-e0201n5:704: Tyādyuppatti, kattari lo, asa-bhuvi, sattāyanti attho.
anya-e0201n5:706: Atthito parassati, tūnaṁ tassa tho hoti.
anya-e0201n5:707: ‘Pararūpamayakāre byañjane’ti suttena byañjane pare dhātvantassa pararūpattaṁ, ‘catutthadutiyesvesaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā’ti suttena pararūpassa dutiyassa paṭhamattaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:709_0: Ettha ca “atthi tvaṁ etarahi, na tvaṁ natthi, atthi ahaṁ etarahi, nāhaṁ natthi, puttā
anya-e0201n5:709_1: matthi dhanā matthi dha. pa. 62, atthi imasmiṁ kāye kesā”ti khu. pā. 3.dvitiṁsākāra
anya-e0201n5:710_0: “Atthīti kho kaccāyana ayameko anto, natthīti dutiyo anto”ti saṁ. ni. 2.15 ca “atthipaccayo,
anya-e0201n5:710_1: natthipaccayo”ti paṭṭhā. 1.1.paccayuddesa ca evamādīsu nāmapaṭirūpako. Tathā natthisaddo.
anya-e0201n5:711: Tumhi-vipassissa ca namatthu dī. ni. 3.287, namo te buddha vīratthu saṁ. ni. 1.90, ettha ca “dhiratthumaṁ pūtikāya”nti ādīsu atthusaddo nipāto.
anya-e0201n5:713: Nta, māna, anti, antu, iyā, iyuṁsu atthissa ādilopo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:717_0: Manussosi mahāva. 126, purisosi mahāva. 126. Himhi dīgho, tvaṁ paṇḍito āhi, bhavāhīti
anya-e0201n5:717_1: attho. Tavibhattīsu dhātvantassa pararūpaṁ, tumhe attha, kaccittha parisuddhā pārā.
anya-e0201n5:717_2: 233. Tvādimhi-mā pamādattha ma. ni. 1.88, 215, tumhe samaggā attha.
anya-e0201n5:719: Atthito paresaṁ mi, mānaṁ mhi, mhā honti vā, atthissa ca aṭa hoti.
anya-e0201n5:721: Tvādimhi-ahaṁ iminā puññena anāgate paññavā amhi, mayaṁ paññavanto amha.
anya-e0201n5:723: Etesu mi, mesu atthissa sassa so hoti. Pararūpanisedhanatthamidaṁ suttaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:724: Ahaṁ paṇḍito asmi, mayaṁ paṇḍitā asma.
anya-e0201n5:725: Tvādimhi-ahaṁ anāgate paññavā asmi, mayaṁ paññavanto asma.
anya-e0201n5:727: 634.Atthiteyyādichannaṁ sa su sasi satha saṁsāmaka. 571, 517; rū. 624, 488; nī. 830, 1105; ‘atthiteyyādicchannaṁ sasusasatha saṁ sāma’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n5:728: ‘Atthī’ti dhātuniddeso ti-kāro, atthito paresaṁ eyyādīnaṁ channaṁ sādayo honti.
anya-e0201n5:729: Evamassa vacanīyo pārā. 411, evamassu vacanīyā pārā 418, tvaṁ assasi, tumhe assatha, ahaṁ assaṁ, mayaṁ assāma.
anya-e0201n5:730_0: Assunipātopi bahuṁ dissati, tayassu dhammā jahitā bhavanti khu. pā. 6.10, kenassu
anya-e0201n5:730_1: taratī oghaṁ, kenassu tarati aṇṇavaṁ saṁ. ni. 1.246. “Kiṁsu chetvā sukhaṁ seti, kiṁsu
anya-e0201n5:730_2: chetvā na socatī”ti saṁ. ni. 1.71 ettha niggahītamhā saṁyogādilopo.
anya-e0201n5:732: Atthito eyyādīsu ādimhi dvinnaṁ iyā, iyuṁ honti. ‘Ntamānantantiyiyuṁsū…’tiādilopo.
anya-e0201n5:733: So siyā, te siyuṁ, ete dve nipātāpi honti. “Vedanākkhandho siyā kusalo, siyā akusalo, siyā abyākato”ti vibha. 152 ādīsu ekaccoti attho.
anya-e0201n5:734: “Siyā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjeyya hetupaccayā”ti paṭṭhā. 1.1.35-38 ādīsu kinnūti attho.
anya-e0201n5:736_0: Mahāvuttinā eyyuṁ, eyyamiccetesaṁ iyaṁsu, iyaṁ honti, ādilopo, siyaṁsu dve bhikkhū
anya-e0201n5:736_1: abhidhamme nānāvādā ma. ni. 3.35, evaṁrūpo siyaṁ ahaṁ anāgatamaddhānaṁ, evaṁvedano
anya-e0201n5:740: So āsi, te āsuṁ, āsiṁsu, tvaṁ āsi, tumhe āsittha, ahaṁ āsiṁ. Tatrāpāsiṁ evaṁvaṇṇo dī. ni. 1.245; ma. ni. 1.68. Mayaṁ āsimha, āsimhā.
anya-e0201n5:742_0: Aādiparokkhāyañca āādihiyyattaniyañca ssādīsu bhavissanti, kālātipattīsu ca atthissa
anya-e0201n5:742_1: bhū hoti. Idañca suttaṁ atthissa etāsaṁ vibhattīnampi sādhāraṇakaraṇatthaṁ. Rūpampi bhūrūpameva.
anya-e0201n5:743: So babhūva, te babhūvu, so abhavā, te abhavū, so bhavissati, te bhavissanti, so abhavissā, te abhavissaṁsu iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:745_0: Tyādivajjitesu ntavajjitesu ca paccayesu atthissa bhū hoti. Etena tyādi, tvādi, eyyādi,
anya-e0201n5:745_1: īādisaṅkhātāsu catūsu vibhattīsu ntapaccaye ca atthissa bhūādeso natthi, sesāsu catūsu
anya-e0201n5:745_2: vibhattīsu ca ntavajjitesu tabbādīsu ca atthissa bhūādeso labbhatīti veditabbo.
anya-e0201n5:746: Āsa-upavesane. Guruṁ upāsati, payirupāsati, upāsanti, payirupāsanti.
anya-e0201n5:748: Kārite-mātā puttaṁ guruṁ upāseti, payirupāseti, upāsayati, payirupāsayati.
anya-e0201n5:749: Īādimhi-upāsi, payirupāsi, upāsiṁsu, payirupāsiṁsu, upāsuṁ, payirupāsuṁ.
anya-e0201n5:752: Gamu, yamu, isu, āsa, disānaṁ anto byañjano ṅānubandho ccho hoti vā nta, māna, tyādīsu.
anya-e0201n5:753: Gacchanto, niyacchanto, icchanto, acchanto, dicchantoti iminā tyādīsu āsassa ccho, acchati, acchanti, so acchi, te acchiṁsu.
anya-e0201n5:756: Antassa samīpe pavattatīti upanto, byañjanantadhātūnaṁ pubbassaro ‘upanto’ti vuccati, lahubhūtassa upantabhūtassa ca ivaṇṇu’vaṇṇassa e, ovuddhī honti.
anya-e0201n5:758: Lahussāti kiṁ? Jīvati, dhūpati, ikkhati, sukkhati.
anya-e0201n5:759: Upantassāti kiṁ? Siñcati, bhuñjati, niggahītāgamena byavahitattā upanto na hoti.
anya-e0201n5:761: Iminā issa evuddhi hoti, esati, anvesati, pariyesati.
anya-e0201n5:765: Isu-icchāyaṁ, cchādeso, icchati, icchanti, sampaṭicchati, sampaṭicchanti.
anya-e0201n5:768: Kamme-icchāpīyati, icchāpayīyati, so icchi, te icchiṁsu, icchissati, icchissanti.
anya-e0201n5:769: Kamu-vijjhane, gambhīresu ṭhānesu ñāṇaṁ kamati, na satthaṁ kamati, na visaṁ kamati, na aggi kamati a. ni. 8.1, na vijjhatīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:770: Kamu-padagamane, pakkamati, apakkamati, upakkamati, vikkamati, abhikkamati, paṭikkamati, atikkamati, saṅkamati, okkamati.
anya-e0201n5:772: Nimhā parassa kamassa kassa kho hoti. ‘Ādissā’ti saṅketattā kassāti ñāyati.
anya-e0201n5:776: Byañjanantassa dhātussa ādimhi a-kārassa āvuddhi hoti ṇānubandhe paccaye. ‘Bahula’nti adhikatattā ṇāpimhi āvuddhi natthi.
anya-e0201n5:777: Pakkāmeti, pakkāmayati, nikkhāmeti, nikkhāmayati, nikkhamāpeti, nikkhamāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:778_0: Īādimhi mahāvuttinā ādidīgho vā hoti, so pakkami, pakkāmi, idaṁ vatvāna pakkāmi,
anya-e0201n5:778_1: maddī sabbaṅgasobhaṇā jā. 2.22.1857, pakkamuṁ, pakkāmuṁ, sammodamānā pakkāmuṁ, aññamaññaṁ
anya-e0201n5:778_2: piyaṁ vadā jā. 2.22.1868, pakkamiṁsu, pakkāmiṁsu, pakkamaṁsu, pakkāmaṁsu, pakkamissati,
anya-e0201n5:779_0: Āpubbo kusa-akkose, lahupantattā vuddhi, akkosati, akkosanti. Papubbo āmantane, pakkosati,
anya-e0201n5:779_1: pakkosanti. Vipubbo uccasadde, vikkosati, vikkosanti. Paṭipubbo nīvāraṇe, paṭikkosati, paṭikkosanti.
anya-e0201n5:782: Kusato ruhato ca parassa īssa cchi hoti.
anya-e0201n5:783: Akkocchi maṁ avadhi maṁ dha. pa. 3-4, idañca rūpaṁ kudha, kupadhātūhipi sādhenti, evaṁ sati “akkocchi me”ti pāṭho siyā. Akkosi, akkosiṁsu.
anya-e0201n5:784_0: Gamu gatimhi, kattari lo, ‘ūlasse’ti lassa ettaṁ, gameti, gamenti. Avapubbo ñāṇe,
anya-e0201n5:784_1: avagameti, avagamenti, adhipubbo ñāṇe lābhe ca, adhigameti, adhigamenti. Vipubbo
anya-e0201n5:786: Pubbarūpatte-gammati, gammanti, adhigammati, adhigammanti, adhigammare, adhigammate, adhigammante, adhigammare.
anya-e0201n5:787: Kārite vuddhi natthi, gameti, gamayati, gamāpeti, gamāpayati.
anya-e0201n5:789_0: Hiyyattanimhi-so agamā, gamā, te agamū, gamū, tvaṁ agamo, agama, agami, tumhe agamuttha,
anya-e0201n5:789_1: ahaṁ agamiṁ, gamiṁ, mayaṁ agamamhā, gamamhā, agamumhā, gamumhā, so agamattha, te
anya-e0201n5:789_2: agamatthuṁ, tvaṁ agamase, tumhe agamavhaṁ, ahaṁ agamaṁ, mayaṁ agamamhase.
anya-e0201n5:790: Ajjhattanimhi īādīsu ikārāgamo, so agamī, gamī.
anya-e0201n5:792: Mahāvuttinā ākārena saha sāgamo, so agamāsi, gāmaṁ agamāsi, nagaraṁ agamāsi.
anya-e0201n5:793: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādinā īssa ttho, so gāmaṁ agamittho, gamittho, te agamuṁ, gamuṁ.
anya-e0201n5:794: ‘Uṁssiṁsvaṁsū’ti iṁsu, aṁsu, te agamiṁsu, gamiṁsu, agamaṁsu, gamaṁsu, tvaṁ agamo, gamo.
anya-e0201n5:795: ‘Ossa a i ttha ttho’ ‘sī’ti suttāni, tvaṁ agama, gama, agami, gami, agamittha, gamittha, agamittho, gamittho, agamāsi, gamāsi, tumhe agamittha.
anya-e0201n5:796: ‘Mhātthānamuu’iti uttaṁ, tumhe agamuttha, gamuttha, ahaṁ agamiṁ, gamiṁ, agamāsiṁ, gamāsiṁ, mayaṁ agamimhā, gamimhā.
anya-e0201n5:797: Rassatte-agamimha, gamimha, agamumhā, gamumhā, agamumha, gamumha, agamāsimhā, gamāsimhā, agamāsimha, gamāsimha.
anya-e0201n5:800: ‘Eyyāthasse’iccādinā tthatte-so agamittha, gamittha, te agamū, gamū.
anya-e0201n5:801: Rassatte-agamu, gamu, tvaṁ agamise, gamise, tumhe agamivhaṁ, gamivhaṁ, ahaṁ agama, gama, agamaṁ, gamaṁ vā, agamimhe, gamimhe.
anya-e0201n5:802: Kamme-agamīyi, agammi, agamīyittho, agammittho, agamīyuṁ, gamīyuṁ, agamīyiṁsu, gamīyiṁsu, agammuṁ, gammuṁ, agammiṁsu, gammiṁsu.
anya-e0201n5:804: Kārite-agamāpayi, gamāpayi, agamāpesi, gamāpesi, agamāpayuṁ, gamāpayuṁ, agamāpayiṁsu, gamāpayiṁsu.
anya-e0201n5:806: Āādimhi īādimhi ca gamissa massa ā hoti. Saralopo.
anya-e0201n5:807: So agā, te agū, tvaṁ ago, tumhe aguttha, ahaṁ agaṁ, mayaṁ agumhā.
anya-e0201n5:808: Īādimhi īsaralopo, agā devāna santike jā. 1.14.205, vāyaso anupariyagā su. ni. 449.
anya-e0201n5:809: Āpubbo āgamane, anavhito tato āgā jā. 1.5.21, sopā’gā samitiṁ vanaṁ dī. ni. 2.335.
anya-e0201n5:810: Adhipubbo paṭilābhe, ajjhagā amataṁ santiṁ vi. va. 846, taṇhānaṁ khayamajjhagā dha. pa. 154.
anya-e0201n5:811: Atipubbo upādhipubbo ca titikkame, nakkhattaṁ paṭimānentaṁ, attho bālaṁ upajjhagā jā. 1.1.49. Khaṇo ve mā upajjhagā.
anya-e0201n5:812_0: Etāni o, avacanānaṁ lope sati tumha’mhayogepi labhanti, aguṁ, agiṁsu, agaṁsu. Samantā
anya-e0201n5:812_1: vijjutā āguṁ jā. 2.22.2264, tepā’guṁsamitiṁ vanaṁ (gavesitabbaṁ), visesaṁ ajjhagaṁsute
anya-e0201n5:812_2: dī. ni. 2.354, asesaṁ parinibbanti, asesaṁ dukkhamajjhaguṁ itivu. 93, sabbaṁ dukkhaṁ

anya-e0201n5:812_4: ajjhagiṁ, ajjhagimhā, ajjhagumhā, agā, āgā, anvagā, ajjhagā, upajjhagā, agū, āgū.
anya-e0201n5:812_5: Āgū devā yasassino dī. ni. 2.340, cittassa ekadhammassa, sabbeva vasamanvagū saṁ.
anya-e0201n5:812_6: ni. 1.61. Cetā haniṁsu vedabbaṁ, sabbe te byasanamajjhagū jā. 1.1.48.
anya-e0201n5:813_0: Parokkhāyaṁ ādissa dvittaṁ, ‘kavaggahānaṁ cavaggajā’ti pubbassa cavaggo. So jagama,
anya-e0201n5:813_1: mahāvuttinā upantassa dīgho, kvaci assa ittaṁ, “rājā dudīpo jagāmi magga”nti jā.
anya-e0201n5:813_2: 2.22.911; ‘rājā dudīpopi jagāma saggaṁ’ pāḷi. So jagāma, te jagāmu, tvaṁ jagame.
anya-e0201n5:814: Byañjanādimhi ikārāgamo, tumhe jagamittha, ahaṁ jagamaṁ, mayaṁ jagamimha, so jagamittha, te jagamire, tvaṁ jagamittho, tumhe jagamivho, ahaṁ jagamiṁ, mayaṁ jagamimhe.
anya-e0201n5:816: Parachakke-so gamissate, te gamissante, gamissare, tvaṁ gamissase, tumhe gamissavhe, ahaṁ gamissaṁ, mayaṁ gamissāmhe.
anya-e0201n5:818: ‘Āīūmhāssāssāmhānaṁ vā’ti ssā, ssāmhānaṁ rasso, agamissa, gamissa, te agamissaṁsu, gamissaṁsu, tvaṁ agamisse, gamisse.
anya-e0201n5:819: ‘Eyyāthasse’ iccādinā ssessa attaṁ, tvaṁ agamissa, gamissa, tumhe agamissatha, gamissatha, ahaṁ agamissaṁ, gamissaṁ, mayaṁ agamissāmhā, gamissāmhā, agamissāmha, gamissāmha.
anya-e0201n5:820: ‘Gama vada dānaṁ ghammavajjadajjā’ti sabbavibhattīsu gamissa ghammo, ghammati, ghammanti.
anya-e0201n5:822: Mahāvuttinā gagghādeso vā, tvaṁ yena yeneva gagghasi, phāsuṁyeva gagghasi a. ni. 8.63.
anya-e0201n5:823: ‘Gamayamisāsadisānaṁ vācchaṅa’ iti suttena sabbavibhattīsu gamissa massa ccho, gacchati, gacchanti, gacchare.
anya-e0201n5:825: Kārite-gacchāpeti, gacchāpayati. Gacchatu, gacchantu, gaccheyya, gaccheyyuṁ.
anya-e0201n5:827: ‘Eyyeyyāseyyaṁnaṁ ṭe’iti suttena eyya, eyyāsi, eyyaṁvibhattīnaṁ ettaṁ, so gacche, tvaṁ gacche, ahaṁ gacche.
anya-e0201n5:830: Īādimhi-agacchi, gacchi, agacchuṁ, gacchuṁ, agacchiṁsu, gacchiṁsu.
anya-e0201n5:832: Āādīsu īādīsu ca ḍaṁsassa ca anto byañjano ñchaṅa hoti.
anya-e0201n5:833: So agañchā, gañchā. Tathā agañchū, gacchū.
anya-e0201n5:835: Tasmiṁ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi, añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo su. ni. 985. Khippameva upāgañchi, yattha sammati temiyo jā. 2.22.73. Te agañchuṁ, gañchuṁ.
anya-e0201n5:837: 646.Labha vasa chida gama bhida rudānaṁ cchaṅaka. 481; rū. 524; nī. 966, 968.
anya-e0201n5:838: Ssena saha etesaṁ cchaṅa hoti vā ssayuttāsu vibhattīsu, suttavibhattena susassa ca, “nadīva avasucchatī”ti jā. 2.22.2140 pāḷi.
anya-e0201n5:839_0: Lacchati, labhissati, alacchā, alabhissā, vacchati, vasissati, avacchā, avasissā,

anya-e0201n5:840: Iminā ssayuttāsu dvīsu vibhattīsu ssena saha gamissa massa ccho, gacchati, gacchissati, gacchanti, gacchissanti, ahaṁ gacchaṁ, gacchissaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:841_0: Atrimā pāḷī-gacchaṁ pāraṁ samuddassa, kassaṁ purisakāriyaṁ jā. 2.22.131, tassāhaṁ
anya-e0201n5:841_1: santikaṁ gacchaṁ, so me satthā bhavissati, sabbāni abhisambhossaṁ, gacchaññeva rathesabha
anya-e0201n5:841_2: jā. 2.22.1832, vedhabyaṁ kaṭukaṁ loke, gacchaññeva rathesabha jā. 2.22.1835.
anya-e0201n5:845: Jara, sadānaṁ saramhā īmaāgamo hoti vāti īmaāgamo.
anya-e0201n5:849: Etesaṁ iyaṅa hoti vā nta, māna, tyādīsu.
anya-e0201n5:854: Janī-pātubhāve, mahāvuttinā sabbavibhattīsu nassa yādeso ādidīgho ca, jāyati, upajāyati, vijāyati, jāyanti, jāyare, pajāyanti, pajāyare, upajāyanti, upajāyare.

anya-e0201n5:856: Kamme-janīyati, janīyanti, jāyatu, jāyantu, jāyeyya, jāyeyyuṁ.
anya-e0201n5:858: Īādimhi-ajāyi, ajāyiṁsu, vijāyi, vijāyiṁsu, ajani, jani vā.
anya-e0201n5:859: Kārite-ajanesi, janesi, ajanayi, janayi, ajanesuṁ, janesuṁ, ajanayuṁ, janayuṁ, ajanayiṁsu, janayiṁsu.
anya-e0201n5:864: Ā, īādīsu ‘ḍaṁsassa ca ñchaṅa’ iti suttaṁ, niggahītalopo, aḍañchā, ḍañchā, aḍañchi, ḍañchi.
anya-e0201n5:866: Kamme yamhi ‘hassa vipallāso’ti pubbāparavipallāso, agginā gāmo dayhati, dayhanti.
anya-e0201n5:873: Disadhātussa passa ca dassa ca dasa ca da ca dakkha cāti ete ādesā honti vā.
anya-e0201n5:874: Vipassanā, vipassī bhagavā, sudassī, piyadassī, atthadassī, dhammadassī, sudassaṁ vajjamaññesaṁ dha. pa. 252, sudassananagaraṁ, mahāsudassano nāma rājā dī. ni. 2.242.
anya-e0201n5:875_0: Dasādese-catusaccaddaso nātho vibha. aṭṭha. suttantabhājanīyavaṇṇanā, duddaso dhammo
anya-e0201n5:875_1: mahāva. 7; dī. ni. 2.64, attano pana duddasaṁ dha. pa. 252, so ve bhikkhu dhammadasoti
anya-e0201n5:875_2: vuccati gavesitabbaṁ. Passa dhammaṁ durājānaṁ, sammuḷhettha aviddasū. Daṭṭhabbaṁ, daṭṭhā, daṭṭhunti.
anya-e0201n5:876_0: Iminā suttena disassa sabbavibhattīsu yathārahaṁ passa, dassa, dakkhādesā honti,
anya-e0201n5:876_1: ā, īādīsu dasa, dādesā honti, “dissati, dissantī”ti rūpāni pana yassa pubbarūpattena
anya-e0201n5:876_2: idha kamme sijjhanti, divādigaṇe kattari sijjhanti. Mahāvuttinā addassa, dissādesāpi
anya-e0201n5:876_3: honti. Atrimā pāḷī-yaṁ vāsavaṁ addassāmaṁ jā. 1.6.112; ‘addasāma’, ye mayaṁ bhagavantaṁ
anya-e0201n5:876_4: addassāma gavesitabbaṁ, api me mātaraṁ adassatha ma. ni. 2.356, dissanti bālā abyattā
anya-e0201n5:876_5: mahāva. 82, mayi ime dhammā sandissanti, ahañca imesu dhammesu sandissāmi ma. ni.
anya-e0201n5:876_6: 3.253, nimittāni padissanti, tāni ajja padissareti bu. vaṁ. 2.82, tasmā tyādīsupi
anya-e0201n5:876_7: “adassati, adassanti, adassasi, adassatha, adassāmi, addassāmā”ti yujjanti.
anya-e0201n5:877: Kārite ṇimhi dassādeso, dasseti, dassayati, nidasseti, nidassayati, sandasseti, sandassayati.
anya-e0201n5:878: Kamme-dassīyati, dassīyanti, nidassīyati, nidassīyanti, sandassīyati, sandassīyanti, dakkhati, dakkhanti.
anya-e0201n5:880: ‘Gamayamisāsadisānaṁ cchaṅa’ iti cchādese- dicchati, dicchanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:881: Passati, passanti, dakkhati, dakkhanti, passīyati, passīyanti, dakkhīyati, dakkhīyanti.
anya-e0201n5:882: Yassa pubbarūpatte-dissati, dissanti, dissate, dissante, uddissate, uddissante, niddissate, niddissante, apadissate, apadissante.
anya-e0201n5:885: Passatu, passantu, dakkhatu, dakkhantu, passeyya, passeyyuṁ, dakkheyya, dakkheyyuṁ.
anya-e0201n5:886_0: Eyyāmassa emu ca antassa u ca honti. “Kattha passemu khattiyaṁ jā. 2.2.1947, dakkhemu
anya-e0201n5:886_1: te nivesana”nti jā. 1.15.254 (…nivesanāni) pāḷi. Passeyyāma, passeyyāmu, dakkheyyāma, dakkheyyāmu.
anya-e0201n5:888: Dasa, dādesesu dakārassa dvittaṁ, addasā kho bhagavā mahāva. 9; dī. ni. 2.69; saṁ. ni. 1.159, addasā kho āyasmā ānando ma. ni. 1.364.
anya-e0201n5:889_0: Rassatte-tamaddasa mahābrahmā, nisinnaṁ samhi vesmani jā. 1.16.148. Te addasū. Rassatte-addasu,
anya-e0201n5:889_1: āmantayassu vo putte, mā te mātaramaddasu jātake “āmantayassu te putte, mā te mātara maddasuṁ”.
anya-e0201n5:891: Rassatte-adda. Yāyamāno mahārājā, addā sīdantare nage jā. 2.22.2105. Yo dukkhaṁ sukhato adda, dukkhamaddakkhi sallato dī. ni. 2.368.
anya-e0201n5:892: Īādimhi-apassi, passi, apassī, passī, apassiṁsu, passiṁsu, apassi, passi, apassittha, passittha, apassiṁ, passiṁ, apassimhā, passimhā.
anya-e0201n5:893: Dassādese-addassi, addassuṁ, addassiṁsu, addassaṁsu, addassi, addassittha, addassiṁ, addassimhā.
anya-e0201n5:896: Parachakke-addasā, addasū, ahaṁ addasaṁ, mayaṁ addassimhe. Addasaṁ kāma te mūlaṁ, saṅkappā kāma jāyasi jā. 1.8.39.
anya-e0201n5:897_0: Kvaci sāgame ākārāgamo, so addasāsi, te addasāsuṁ, ahaṁ addasāsiṁ, mayaṁ adasāsimha.
anya-e0201n5:897_1: Yaṁ addasāsiṁ sambuddhaṁ, desentaṁ dhammamuttamaṁ theragā. 287. Athaddasāsiṁ sambuddhaṁ,
anya-e0201n5:898: Mahāvuttinā iṁssa imhi hoti, pathe addasāsimhi bhojaputte jā. 2.17.146.
anya-e0201n5:900: Dakkhādese‘dakkha sakkha hehi’iccādinā ssassalopo, dakkhati, dakkhanti, dakkhiti, dakkhinti, dakkhissati, dakkhissanti.
anya-e0201n5:903: ‘Jaramarānamiyaṅa’iti iyādeso, miyati, miyanti, amhaṁ daharā na miyyare jā. 1.10.97.
anya-e0201n5:904: Kārite ‘assā ṇānubandhe’ti āvuddhi, māreti, mārenti, mārayati, mārayanti, mārāpeti, mārāpenti, mārāpayati, mārāpayanti.
anya-e0201n5:905: Yamu-uparame, yamati, yamanti. Pare ca na vijānanti, mayamettha yamāmase. Ettha ca ‘yamāmase’ti viramāmase, maraṇaṁ gacchāmaseti attho.
anya-e0201n5:909: ‘Gamayamisāsadisānaṁ vā cchaṅa’iti massa cchādeso, niyacchati, niyacchanti.
anya-e0201n5:913: Ṇāpimhi na vuddhi, niyamāpeti, niyamāpayati, vavatthapetīti attho.
anya-e0201n5:915_0: Ssatyādimhi-‘labhavasachidagamabhidānaṁ cchaṅa’iti ssena saha dassa cchādeso, sā
anya-e0201n5:915_1: nūna kapaṇā ammā, cirarattāya rucchati jā. 2.22.2136. Koñjī samuddatīreva, kapaṇā
anya-e0201n5:915_2: nūna rucchati jā. 2.21.113. Sā nūna kapaṇā ammā, ciraṁ rucchati assame jā. 2.22.2138,
anya-e0201n5:915_3: kaṁ nva’jja chātā tasitā, uparucchanti dārakā jā. 2.22.2153. Rodissati, rodissanti,
anya-e0201n5:917: Ruha-pāpuṇane, ruhati, ruhanti, āruhati, āruhanti, ārohati, ārohanti, abhiruhati, abhiruhanti, oruhati, oruhanti, orohati, orohanti.
anya-e0201n5:919: ‘Hassa vipallāso’ti ha, yānaṁ vipariyāyo, āruyhati, oruyhati.
anya-e0201n5:923: Yassa pubbarūpatte ‘catutthadutiyesvesaṁ tatiyapaṭhamā’ti saṁyogādissa catutthassa tatiyattaṁ, labbhati, labbhanti, labbhare.
anya-e0201n5:926: Labhamhā paresaṁ iṁ, īnaṁ kamena thaṁ, thā honti vā, dhātvantassa pararūpattaṁ, saṁyogādissa dutiyassa paṭhamattaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:927: Ahaṁ alatthaṁ, alabhiṁ vā, so alattha, alabhi vā.
anya-e0201n5:928_0: Mahāvuttinā uṁssa thuṁ, thaṁsu honti, mhāssa ca thamhā, thuṁmhā honti, te bhagavato
anya-e0201n5:928_1: santike pabbajjañca upasampadañca alatthuṁ dī. ni. 2.77, satiṁ paccalatthuṁ, viparītasaññaṁ
anya-e0201n5:928_2: paccalatthuṁ, te satiṁ paccalatthaṁsu, agamamhā kho tava gehaṁ, tattha neva dānaṁ
anya-e0201n5:928_3: alatthamhā ma. ni. 2.300 (thokaṁ visadisaṁ), akkosameva alatthamhā, mayañca alatthamhā
anya-e0201n5:928_4: savanāya, alatthumhā vā. Dhātvantassa ccho ca. Tadāhaṁ pāpikaṁ diṭṭhiṁ, paṭilacchiṁ
anya-e0201n5:929_0: Ssatyādimhi-‘labhavasa chida gama bhida rudānaṁ cchaṅa’iti suttena ssena saha dhātvantassa
anya-e0201n5:929_1: cchādeso, lacchati, labhissati, lacchanti, labhissanti, lacchasi, labhissasi, lacchatha,
anya-e0201n5:929_2: labhissatha, lacchāmi, labhissāmi, lacchāma, labhissāma. Lacchāma putte jīvantā,
anya-e0201n5:933: Yassa pubbarūpatte ‘assū’ti suttena ādimhi akārassa uttaṁ, vuccati, vuccanti, vuccare, vuccate, vuccante, vuccare.
anya-e0201n5:934: Kārite-vāceti, vācenti, vācayati, vācayanti, vācāpeti, vācāpenti, vācāpayati, vācāpayanti.
anya-e0201n5:936: Mahāvuttinā ākārena saha sāgamo, avacāsi, vacāsi, avacuṁ, vacuṁ, avaciṁsu, vaciṁsu, tvaṁ avaco, avaca, avaci, avacāsi, avacittha, avacittho, tumhe avacittha.
anya-e0201n5:937: ‘Mhāthānamuña’iti suttaṁ, tumhe avacuttha, vacuttha, ahaṁ avaciṁ, vaciṁ, avacāsiṁ, vacāsiṁ, mayaṁ avacimhā, vacimhā, avacimha, vacimha vā, mayaṁ avacumhā, vacumhā, so avacā, vacā.
anya-e0201n5:938: Rassatte-avaca, avacittha, vacittha vā, ahaṁ avacaṁ, avaca, vaca vā, mayaṁ avacimhe, vacimhe.
anya-e0201n5:941: So avoci, te avocuṁ, avociṁsu, tvaṁ avoci, tumhe avocuttha, ahaṁ avociṁ, mayaṁ avocumhā, so avoca, rasso, bhagavā etadavoca udā. 20.

anya-e0201n5:949: Lassa ette-vadeti, vadenti, vadesi, vadetha, vademi, vadema.

anya-e0201n5:952: Kārite-bheriṁ vādeti, vādenti, vādayati, vādayanti, guruṁ abhivādeti, abhivādenti, abhivādesi, abhivādetha, abhivādemi, abhivādema.
anya-e0201n5:953_0: Mahāvuttinā assa ittaṁ, abhivādiyāmi, abhivādiyāma, abhivādayāmi, abhivādayāma vā,

anya-e0201n5:955: ‘Gamavadadānaṁ ghammavajjadajjā vā’ti vajjādeso, ‘ūlasse’ti lassa ettaṁ, vajjeti, vajjenti.
anya-e0201n5:958: Eyyādimhi-‘eyyeyyāseyyaṁnaṁṭe’iti eyyādīnaṁ ekavacanānaṁ ettaṁ, vade, vadeyya, vajje, vajjeyya, vadeyyuṁ, vajjeyyuṁ.
anya-e0201n5:959: Vajjādese mahāvuttinā eyyassa āttaṁ, eyyumādīnaṁ eyyasaddassa lopo, so vajjā, te vajjuṁ.
anya-e0201n5:960: Eyyādīnaṁ yyāsaddassa lopo vā, tvaṁ vajjāsi, vajjesi, tumhe vajjātha, vajjetha, ahaṁ vajjāmi, vajjemi, mayaṁ vajjāma, vajjema, ahaṁ vajjaṁ, mayaṁ vajjāmhe, vajjeyyāmhe.
anya-e0201n5:961_0: Atrimā pāḷī-vajjuṁ vā te na vā vajjuṁ, natthi nāsāya rūhanā jā. 1.3.33, ammaṁ ārogyaṁ

anya-e0201n5:1474: Ji, harānaṁ dvitte parassa jissa harassa ca gī hoti se pare.
anya-e0201n5:1476: Hara-haraṇe, dvittādi, parassa gī, pubbassa hassa jo, assa ittaṁ, jigīsati, harituṁ icchatīti attho, jigīsanti.
anya-e0201n5:1477: Pā-pāne, pivituṁ icchatīti atthe – sapaccayo, dvittaṁ, ‘rasso pubbassā’ti rasso, assa ittaṁ, pipāsati, pipāsanti, pipāsīyati, pipāsīyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1478_0: Su-savane, sotuṁ icchatīti atthe – dvitte parassa dvittaṁ, sussusati sussūsati (bahūsu),
anya-e0201n5:1478_1: sussusanti, sussusīyati, sussusīyanti, sussuseti, sussusayati, sussusāpeti, sussusāpayati,
anya-e0201n5:1479: Titikkhituṁ icchatīti atthe – titikkhato sapaccayo, sapaccayaparattā puna dvittappasaṅge –
anya-e0201n5:1481: Sakiṁ dvitte kate puna dvittaṁ na āpajjatīti puna dvittābhāvo, ‘ū byañjanassā’ti ū āgamo.
anya-e0201n5:1482: Titikkhisati, titikkhisanti iccādi. Evaṁ tikicchituṁ icchatīti tikicchisati, tikicchisanti, cikicchisati, cikicchisanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1483: Iti tumicchatthe kha, cha, sa rāsi.
anya-e0201n5:1487: Kammatthā nāmapadamhā icchatthe īyo hotīti kammabhūtā puttasaddato icchāyaṁ īyo, ‘puttīya’iti dhātupaccayantarūpaṁ, tato tyādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n5:1488_0: Puttīyati, puttīyanti, puttīyeti, puttīyayati, puttīyāpeti, puttīyāpayati, puttīyāpīyati,
anya-e0201n5:1488_1: puttīyāpīyanti. Evaṁ cīvarīyati, cīvarīyanti, pattīyati, pattīyanti, parikkhārīyati,
anya-e0201n5:1491: Upamīyati upametabbo attho etenāti upamānaṁ, upamānabhūtā kammapadato ācāratthe īyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1493: Kamme-aputtopi putto viya ācarīyati puttīyīyati, puttīyīyanti, puttīyeti, puttīyayati, puttīyāpeti, puttīyāpayati, puttīyāpīyati, puttīyāpīyanti. Evaṁ sissīyati, sissīyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1496: Upamānabhūtā ādhārabhūtā ca nāmamhā ācāratthe īyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1497: Kuṭīyati, kuṭīyanti pāsāde, nadiyaṁ viya samudde ācarati nadīyati, nadīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1498: Araññe viya nagare ācarati araññīyati, araññīyanti nagare. Evaṁ gehīyati vihāre.
anya-e0201n5:1499: Lokadhammehi akampanīyaṭṭhena pabbato viya attānaṁ ācaratīti atthe –
anya-e0201n5:1501: Upamānabhūtā kattubhūtā ca nāmamhā ācāratthe āyo hotīti pabbatasaddato āyo. Tato tyādyuppatti.
anya-e0201n5:1502: Pabbatāyati saṅgho, pabbatāyanti, cicciṭo viya attānaṁ ācarati cicciṭāyati, saddo. Evaṁ paṭapaṭāyati, kaṭakaṭāyati, dhūmadhūmāyati, dhūpāyati, sandhūpāyati.
anya-e0201n5:1505: Cīpaccayassa attho abbhūtatabbhāvo jhattho nāma. Kattuto jhatthe āyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1506: Bhusāyati, bhusāyanti, apaṭopi paṭo bhavati paṭāyati, paṭāyanti, alohitampi lohitaṁ bhavati lohitāyati. Evaṁ nīlāyati, kamalāyati, candāyati, candanāyati, kañcanāyati, vajirāyati.
anya-e0201n5:1510: Saddādīhi dutiyantehi nāmehi karotyatthe āyo hoti.
anya-e0201n5:1511_0: Saddāyati, saddāyanti, veraṁ karoti verāyati, verāyanti, kalahaṁ karoti kalahāyati,
anya-e0201n5:1511_1: kalahāyanti, mettaṁ karoti mettāyati, mettāyanti, karuṇaṁ karoti karuṇāyati, karuṇāyanti,
anya-e0201n5:1511_2: muditaṁ karoti muditāyati, muditāyanti, upekkhaṁ karoti upekkhāyati, upekkhāyanti,
anya-e0201n5:1511_3: kukkuccaṁ karoti kukkuccāyati, kukkuccāyanti, piyaṁ karoti piyāyati, piyāyanti, paccayaṁ
anya-e0201n5:1511_4: saddahanaṁ karoti pattiyāyati, pattiyāyanti, taṇhaṁ karoti taṇhāyati, taṇhāyanti,
anya-e0201n5:1511_5: taṇhīyati, taṇhīyanti vā, karotyatthe īyo. Mama idanti karoti mamāyati, mamāyanti.
anya-e0201n5:1518: Dhātvattho vuccati yā kāci kriyā. Nāmasmā dhātvatthe i hoti. ‘Yuvaṇṇānameo paccaye’ti issa ettaṁ.
anya-e0201n5:1520_0: ‘Eonamayāvā sare’ti essa ayādeso. ‘Ṇiṇāpyāpīhi vā’ti ettha vāsaddena lapaccayo, samānayati,
anya-e0201n5:1520_1: samānayanti, piṇaṁ karoti piṇeti, piṇayati, kusalaṁ pucchati kusaleti, kusalayati,
anya-e0201n5:1520_2: visuddhaṁ hoti visuddheti, visuddhayati, vīṇāya upagāyati upavīṇeti, upavīṇāyati,
anya-e0201n5:1520_3: paññāya atikkamati atipaññeti, atipaññāyati, vaccaṁ karoti vacceti, vaccayati, muttaṁ
anya-e0201n5:1520_4: karoti mutteti, muttayati, balena pīḷeti baleti, balayati.
anya-e0201n5:1525_0: Saccāpeti, saccāpenti, atthavibhāgaṁ karoti atthāpeti, atthāpenti, bedasatthaṁ karoti
anya-e0201n5:1525_1: bedāpeti, bedāpenti, sukkhaṁ karoti sukkhāpeti, sukkhāpenti, sukhaṁ karoti sukhāpeti,
anya-e0201n5:1525_2: sukhāpenti, dukkhaṁ karoti dukkhāpeti, dukkhāpenti, uṇhaṁ karoti uṇhāpeti, uṇhāpenti iccādi.
anya-e0201n5:1526: Aputtaṁ puttamiva ācarati puttīyati, puttīyituṁ icchatīti atthe ‘tuṁsmā lopo cicchāyaṁ te’ti sapaccayo.
anya-e0201n5:1528_0: Icchīyatīti iṭṭhaṁ, yaṁ yaṁ iṭṭhaṁ yathiṭṭhaṁ. “Yamiṭṭha”ntipi pāṭho. Syādyantassa
anya-e0201n5:1528_1: yathiṭṭhaṁ ekassaraṁ ādibhūta’maññaṁ vā dverūpaṁ hoti, na tyādissa viya ādibhūtamevāti
anya-e0201n5:1531: Akamalaṁ kamalaṁ bhavati kamalāyati, kamalāyituṁ icchatīti kakamalāyisati, kamamalāyisati, kamalalāyisati iccādi.
